item.title: Constitution awareness rally held in Raichur
item.description: <![CDATA[Photo: A constitution awareness rally was held in Raichur city on Tuesday as part of the Constitution Dedication Day celebrationsRaichur: A constitution awareness rally was held in the city on Tuesday as part of the Constitution Dedication Day celebrations. Organised by the Constitution Protection Force Forum, the event was part of the â€˜Drop the baton, give me a pen and a book' campaign. The procession, led by Banthe Swamiji of Buddha Vihar and Basavaraj Swamiji of Gonavar, started from the Karn...]]>
item.author: Tnn
